item.title: Arcanist's Glasses
item.fluff: These spectacles increase your sensitivity to subtle patterns of magic

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +3 item bonus to Arcana checks to detect magic.
Level 13+5 item bonus.
Level 23+8 item bonus.

item.title: Beryl of Catastrophe Avoidance
item.fluff: This blue gem hovers near your nead, improving your ability to speak reasonably

block.name: Properties
block.line: You gain the following benefits:
You gain a +1 item bonus to Diplomacy and Insight checks.
Level 12+3 item bonus
Level 22+5 item bonus
You gain a +2 bonus to Diplomacy and Insight checks against catastrophic dragons.

item.title: Casque of Tactics
item.fluff: Favored by sergeants and commanders, this utilitarian helm is remarkable only for its satin inner padding

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou and at least one ally roll initiative
EffectYou and one willing ally who you can see swap initiative results.

item.title: Circlet of Arcane Extension
item.fluff: This golden circlet extends the range of your arcane powers to strike distant foes

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectUntil the end of your current turn, increase the range of your ranged arcane powers by 2 squares.
Level 15By 5 squares.
Level 25Until the end of your next turn, and by 5 squares.

item.title: Circlet of Second Chances
item.fluff: Luck favors those who don this plain copper accessory

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou fail a saving throw
EffectYou reroll the triggering saving throw, using the second result even if it's lower.
Level 13You gain a +2 power bonus to the roll.
Level 23You gain a +4 power bonus to the roll.

item.title: Command Circlet
item.fluff: Granted to the best warforged commands during the Last War, the command circlet is a mark of distinction and honor

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain telepathy 20, allowing you to communicate with any other creature that has a language and is within line of sight.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerA living contruct ally you can see within 20 squares is subject to a fear effect that a save can end
EffectThe triggering ally can make a saving throw against the triggering effect.

item.title: Cynic's Goggles
item.fluff: With these bronze and leather eye pieces, you more easily see through illusions

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +2 item bonus to Will defense against Illusion attacks, and to Insight checks and Perception checks to detect illusions.

item.title: Eagle Eye Goggles
item.fluff: Though these leather goggles have dark eye pieces, they sharpen your sight when making ranged attacks

item.title: Exceptional Factotum Helm
item.fluff: The knowledge stored within this silver helm is imparted to you when you need it

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou gain training in one skill of your choice until the end of your next turn, or for 1 minute if you are currently not in combat.
Level 14Until the end of the encounter, or for 1 hour if you are currently not in combat.
Level 24Training in two skills of your choice until the end of the encounter, or for 1 hour if you are currently not in combat.

item.title: Gem of Colloquy
item.fluff: This jewel hovers near your nead, sharpening your wit and expanding your knowledge of languages

block.name: Properties
block.line: You gain the following benefits:
You gain a +1 item bonus to Bluff and Diplomacy checks.
Level 12+3 item bonus
Level 22+5 item bonus
You understand and speak 1 additional language. The language is chosen when the item is created.
Level 122 additional languages
Level 123 additional languages

item.title: Goggles of Aura Sight
item.fluff: These goggles aid in diagnoses and healing
item.headline: Item BonusHeal checks

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectRanged 10 (one creature you can see); You learn the following information:
The target's current and maximum hit points values.
Any current disease or poison effects affecting the target.
Any disease or poison effects the target can inflict.

item.title: Headband of Perception
item.fluff: This chiffon headwrap is stitched with eye-shaped patters, which heighten your senses

item.title: Helm of Opportunity
item.fluff: This simple bronze helm allows you to strike more accurately at those who let their guard down

item.title: Helm of Seven Deaths
item.fluff: Set above this black helm's brow there are seven gems that are dull, dead things, as if they once held magical power that has long since been spent

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectChoose one bloodied creature that you have hit with an attack during your current turn.
You learn the chosen creature's current and maximum hit points values.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou reduce a creature 0 hit points or fewer
EffectThe triggering creature dies, and its soul is trapped in one of this helm's seven gems.
A gem can hold no more than one soul at a time, and glows with a green radiance while it countains a soul. The dead creature cannot be returned to life while its soul is captured in this manner.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: RequirementAt least three of the helm's seven gems must contain a soul.
EffectYou regain hit points equal to 5 + one-half your level, and two of the helm's gems release their souls.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: RequirementAll seven of the helm's gems must contain a soul.

EffectOn the first damage roll you make during your current turn, choose up to four of the dice your rolled. You treat those dice as having rolled their maximum result instead, and all seven gems release their souls.
If you do not make an attack during your current turn, the souls are not released.

item.title: Helm of the Stubborn Mind
item.fluff: This helm fortifies you against enchanters

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +2 item bonus to all defenses against Charm attacks.

item.title: Reading Spectacles
item.fluff: Your vision blurs the first time you put on these spectacles, then written text comes into perfect focus and clarity

block.name: Property
block.line: When this item created, the creator chooses any three languages.
You can read the chosen languages, though the spectacles do not grant the ability to speak or write languages.
Level 12You can read any language, and gain a +4 item bonus to checks related to reading the languages chosen when this item was created.

item.title: Skull Mask
item.fluff: This rough iron visor is shaped in the likeness of a skull whose grim countenance saps your enemies' courage.
item.headline: Item BonusIntimidate checks

block.name: Properties
block.line: The mask has the following properties:
Enemies who can see you take a -2 penalty to their first saving throw against Fear effects.
You gain resist 5 necrotic.
Level 15 or 20Resist 10 necrotic.
Level 25 or 30Resist 15 necrotic.

item.title: Stag Helm
item.fluff: This helm sports a set of antlers, and makes you as alert as a stag
item.headline: Item BonusPerception checks

block.name: Property
block.line: You can take a minor action during a round when you are surprised.
Level 15Move action.
Level 25Either a minor action and move action, or a standard action.
